duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and approve monthly bank reconciliations and G/L reconciliations for corporate entities.
Manage processing of disbursements and oversee debt and other financing and capital transactions.
Address inquiries from banks and partner with FP&A and other controllers for cash flow review and analysis.
Recommend benchmarks for measuring the company's performance and provide short- and long-term financial objectives and policies.
Assist in the preparation of budgets and participate in cross-functional projects to drive overall enhancements to the finance function.
Develop, train, prioritize, and manage the accounting team to meet the company’s needs and objectives.
Work with external auditors and provide needed information for the annual audit.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Business, Finance, or Accounting (MBA preferred)
